message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love.
I love the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I was really hoping to get a bit more for this product. How about we meet in the middle at $135?
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $125. Can you meet me at that price?
I'm getting close to your price, Bob! How about we try $130? That's the best I can do.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit short on budget. How about we try $125.50? That's the lowest I can go.
